ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra'i brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mig
yor lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha
rol du phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /
rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa
'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma
mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa
thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di
ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyis dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed

pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams

cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dod
chags ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa shes
rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum bcu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis
pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /
rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa/
mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di
ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su
med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags
so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sdug
bsngal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab

'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams dmigs su

med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa

nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin
pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang
bzhin stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs

su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams
dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so/ /bcom

ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni lam

lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stong pa

nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni

mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha

rol du phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang /

'gog pa dang / lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni bzod
pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa

'di ni brtson 'grus lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa
'di ni bsam gtan lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol
du phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad du ye shes
chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor

gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon

par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du

sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol du
phyin pa 'di grags par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/ /gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /

klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab

kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni sangs

rgyas mang po dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon

gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su zhu ba byas pa yin no/ /gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar

mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur la/

'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yang brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar

gzung bar bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni zab lags te/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag lam spyad pa dag gis ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi

bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spongs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo

'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba ma mchis pa dang / dang ba ma mchis pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji

ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyod par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/

phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /

stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni shin du zab pas na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la mos par ma gyur pa dang /

stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa

ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bdag

phyag 'tshal lo de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di las nges par

byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab du bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags dang / 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yang

dag par 'jom par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod

par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan
dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na
shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad na/ nang stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor

du bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/

de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes

pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don

de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa skyes pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab du nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /kau shi ka 'di la

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams

dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi

gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor

du byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang / de bzhin du gang la gnas

pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams

dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dmigs

su med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /

'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched

rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad

la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing /

de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la de bzhin du khams

rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni zab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i

bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten

cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa yin no/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'

ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs

kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin

no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /

shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel

par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par

shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams

dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar

gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams

dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting

dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong

pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka'

zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /

'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol

du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag dka'

ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/ gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam

par shes pa ma yin zhing de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos

sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin

no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams

ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba dang / de tsam du rtogs par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis

pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa 'di thos na/ skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / nem nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya

byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo
'di bshad par gyur na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar 'gyur zhing / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur la/ kau shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na phyir spong zhing / log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i las gsog par 'gyur te/ yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang dag
gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang

dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa
'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba
yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
byed cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa
dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpe brjod par bdag
shin du spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom pa dang /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sgom

pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags
par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha

rol du phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing / /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi
pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / /rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs

kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan du nye ba 'am/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan

'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ mi zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig nas sam dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa zhig

nas sam/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/ de byung ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi dag gam/ phyugs rdzi dag gam sa mtshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am tshal dag gam/ bskyed mos tshal dag

mthong bar gyur tam/ grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/ grong rdal dag gam ljongs dag gam/ yul 'khor dag gam mtshan ma gzhan gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag gda' ba las

na/ 'di nas grong dang grong rdal dang grong khyer dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing / de la slan chad chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gdug pas 'jigs pa 'am/ gdol pas

'jigs pa 'am/ gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa 'am bkres pa dang / skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol

du phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid 'chang bar bgyid klog par bgyid kun chub par bgyid tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan

du nye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring po mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/

rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' po des 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi

ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de/ snga ltas de dag mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus

khyod shin du spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis na ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po blta

ba'i slad du mchis pa/ de lta de ltar des yal ga gel ba 'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma dag mthong bar gyur na des 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag ring ste rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas

thag nye ba ma lags so/ /snyam du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga gel pa 'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta

ste dper bgyi na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas/ ji lta ji ltar mchis pa de lta de ltar des yal ga gel pa 'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mthong bar gyur na/

de 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga gel pa 'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma 'am/ ri 'am ri'i mtshan

ma dag mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /mi de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni

'di nas thag mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar nges par rtogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /

kun chub par bgyid pa des kyang 'di ltar rig par bgyi zhing / 'di ltar bsam par bgyi ste/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig gam/

bskal pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mngon sum du lung ma bstan

kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan du nye ba lags so snyam du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du

phyin pa zab mo 'di blta zhing mnyan du rnyed la thos nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang klag pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyir mchis so snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di
lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ dpyid byung ste/ yal ga 'gel ba rnams kyi lo ma dang / 'dab ma lhags par gyur pa na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis 'di ltar da ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog

dang / 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar yal ga 'gel pa rnams la snga ltas de dag gda' ba'i slad du ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis yal ga

'gel ba rnams la snga ltas de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du da ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du

gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/
kun chub par bgyid/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi
bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis kyang 'di snyam du/ gang gi

slad du bdag cag gi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing bltar mchis pa dang / mnyan du mchis pa dang / phyag bgyir mchis pa dang / ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bsgrub tu mchis pa

las na/ bdag cag ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen pa lags so/ /snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/ /de na gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur

pa'i lha'i bu dag 'di snyam du/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas 'di lta bu de dag byung bar gyur pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'di dag kyang / ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas yid rangs shing rab du dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ bud med sbrum pa ni ji lta ji ltar bu btsa' bar nye ba de lta de ltar de'i lus 'gyur te/ lus ngal ba'i tshor ba chen po skye ba dang / 'chag par mi bgyid pa dang / dran pa

chung ba dang / g.yar zas kyi dad chung ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid chung ba dang tshor ba de lta bu dag byung bas smra ba nyung ba dang / des sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyis shing bsten pa dang / lan mang

du bgyis shing kun du bsten pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba 'di dag nyams su myong ngo snyam du rtogs nas/ mi sten pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur zhing / bud med gzhan dag gis kyang / bud med de'i mtshan ma gang lags

pa de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes rtogs par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa

ba bskrun pa sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa spyod pa legs par spyad pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen kyis yongs su zin pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing /

rnyed nas kyang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ring po mi thogs par
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa 'di ni/
sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/ /'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

la sman btags pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /

'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po de dag spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don 'thun pa dang / don spyod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag la phan 'dogs shing / sems can rnams

kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / bdag kyang

chos de dag la gnas par byed do/ /bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bzod

pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing / gzhan dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin

du 'jug ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brten cing / thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la 'god par byed kyang / bdag nyid kyis mngon sum du ni mi byed do/ /de bzhin du/ lan gcig

phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la 'god par byed kyang bdag nyid kyang rang byang chub mngon sum du mi byed do/ /bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon

par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la 'god par byed do/ /de bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par

bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang mngon par shes pa

rnams bskyed par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag par

bya ba la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa

yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang mtshan

phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang gzhon nur gyur pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba yang dag

par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgrub par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi skyed par

byed cing / gzhan dag kyang bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

bzhi skyed par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob par bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgrub par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang

bag chags dang 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang bag chags dang / 'tshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar bya ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /

bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed cing / gzhan dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya bar yang dag par 'dzin

du 'jug go/ /bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po gang dag sems can rnams kyi slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags

so/ /bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs kyi rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang /

tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams

dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam par 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong

ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha

rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i

tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du

phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yongs su 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na/ chos shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ngo / /'das pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung bstan du

yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas shes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dod pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs

kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs med pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /

bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang / gsog nyid dang / gsob nyid dang / snying po med

pa nyid dang ya ma rla nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i

phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor

sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsam gyis

mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub

kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis

mi khyab pa'i phyir/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi

byed/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun tu shes par mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /gal te khams rnams

dang skye mched rnams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar kun du shes par mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab

mo 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang dag sngon pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed skyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen

bkur byed byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes

gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog

go/ /gzugs kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /gzugs kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes

pa'i mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang /

gzugs med pa'i khams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid kyi bar dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshan mar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog

go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang bsam

gyis mi khyab la/ de bzhin du khams rnams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang /

mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs zab pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa lags so/ /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab

pa lags so/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa

dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa lags so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab pa lags

so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub rin po che dag skyed par bgyid pas/ rin po che'i phung po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyid pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin

pa ni chos thams cad kyi dag pa'i phung po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs dag pa nyid dang / tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa nyid dang / khams dang skye mched

dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na bar chad mang po mi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la ni bar chad mang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang ston pa dang klog

pa dang 'chang ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom par byed pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klag pa dang bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar dag la bar

chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar myur ba nyid du yi ger bri bar bya zhing myur ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gal te shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis

yi ger bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du yi ger bri bar bya/ gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam lo'i bar gyis yi ger bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du yi ger bri bar bya/

gal te lo'i bar gyis bshad pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / rab tu bstan par bya ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang bsgom par bya na yang des de bzhin du bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rin po che chen po 'di la

bar chad mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdud sdig can 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger mi bri ba dang / mi klag pa dang kha ton du mi bgyi ba dang / tshul
bzhin du yid la mi bgyi ba dang / bsgom par mi bgyi ba'i slad du bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bdud sdig can ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ci nas kyang yi ger mi bri ba dang / mi klag pa dang kha ton du mi bya ba dang / mi bsgom par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir bar chad bya bar brtson mod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bar chad byed mi nus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das su'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang sgom pa'i bar

dag la bdud sdig can gyis bar chad bgyid par rngo mi thogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa

zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang 'chang ba dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa dag la bdud sdig can bar chad byed mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu gang yang phyogs bcu kun na/ sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la dgongs shing phan

'dogs par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis dgongs shing phan btags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang /

ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bdud sdig can bar chad byed mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'i byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa rnams la bdud sdig can bar chad byed mi

nus pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa

gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin

du yid la byed cing sgom pa de la dgongs par 'gyur ba ni chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang kha ton du byed pa dang /

ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa des kyang 'di ltar bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri'o/ /klog go/ /kha ton du byed do/ /ston to/ /

tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /sgom mo snyam du rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang kha ton du

bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang /

gzhan dag la yang ston par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom par byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin pa dang kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rig par

bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa

dang / ston pa dang sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gis mkhyen lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang lung nod pa dang / kha ton

du bgyid pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / 'chad pa dang /

ston pa dang sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis mkhyen to/ /byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud de/ shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i

rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / gos dang gdugs dang /

rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rigs

kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris shing 'chang ba de

dag kyang don che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smin pa che bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur la/ nam yang ngan

song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi rnams su skyes na yang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa gnon par yang 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang pha rol du phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi

chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas

lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun

chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug

gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed ri mo byed/ mchod pa byed cing / theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa

'am/ theg pa chen pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas/ yul ba ta ni na spyod par 'gyur te/ der yang dge

slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid

la byed par 'gyur zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / gos dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mo byed/

mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug
gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing / theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos rim gyis

nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yul ba ta ni nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu der yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen

ma dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des ngan 'gro log
par ltung ba rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa byed cing / theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen pos rim gyis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na shes rab kyi

pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu chos 'dul ba snying por gyur na/ dam pa'i chos nub

par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /

tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas dgongs pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger 'dri bar
